name: Description
info:
1. ### Receive websocket msg from ESP.
 1. ### Filter the data:
    - BME Readings
    - GPIO status feedback
 3. ### Process and address message
    - assign topic and scale BME readings
    - identify GPIO feedback
 4. ### Display received message
    - BME current - gauge
    - BME historic - chart
    - GPIO Feedback - LED / Template

name: Description
info:
1. ### Process user inputs
    -  Thermostat deadband --> create flow variable
    -  Thermostat control --> evaluate heater required
    -  Digital controls --> 0 / 1
 1. ### Clean message (topic & msg only)
 1. ### Send message to ESP via websocket
